channel.title: [PI] Client Player Text
channel.description:
How do I make it so that when an Administrator types in the chatbox, it appears red. As if you do:
[CODE]@red@@red@ Hi[/CODE]
In the chatbox. Example: [IMG]http://trillahbz.com/red text.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Client Player Text
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:392784”]Haha I pulled my hair out for days over this then I found out it was super easy.

Go to your client folder and open up client.java

near the top you should see this

change that to whatever hex color you want for red try FF0000[/quote]

He wants it only for administrators.

Therefore:

if (myPrivilege >= 3) chatColorHex = FF0000

Idk where to put that though I’m not much with a client…

Read full topic
